t: Amazon's sprawling warehouse robot factories offer a glimpse into modern US manufacturing
s: 5 days ago - Inside an unassuming office park in North Reading, Massachusetts, Amazon employees are hard at work building robots to support its vast network of fulfillment centers. This facility, along with another about 50 miles away in Westborough, provides a modern view of US manufacturing.

t: After Amazon, an ambition to accelerate American manufacturing | MIT News | Massachusetts Institute of Technology
s: After reinventing retail during his two decades at Amazon, MIT LGO alumnus Jeff Wilke is still thinking big, with Re:Build Manufacturing, a new venture that aims to restore America’s manufacturing prowess and revamp its supply chains for the digital age.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
